hero.subtitle: Software Engineer - Centene | Healthcare AI Specialist
hero.description: I'm a Senior Full-Stack Developer specialized in Angular, with extensive experience in MEAN stack solutions and AI/NLP technologies to optimize healthcare processes and enhance user experiences.

about.title: About Me
paragraphs: I'm a Senior Full-Stack Developer with extensive experience creating scalable, high-performance applications. I specialize in Frontend development with Angular (2-19), Ionic, and Flutter, and have strong expertise in building MEAN stack solutions that integrate MongoDB, Express.js, Angular, and Node.js.
Currently working as Software Engineer at Centene through Newfire Global Partners, where I lead Angular 19 migrations and implement AI/NLP capabilities to enhance healthcare processes.

Throughout my career, I've led innovative projects from technological migrations to implementing microservices architectures. In recent roles, I've also worked with Conversational AI and NLP technologies, including LangChain and OpenAI APIs for customer service automation.
about.education: Finance Engineering - Universidad Piloto de Colombia

items.title: Healthcare AI Platform for Centene Corp
items.description: Led successful migration to Angular 19 of a critical healthcare platform, significantly improving performance. Implemented Natural Language Processing (NLP) capabilities to extract structured insights from healthcare interactions. Developed complex reactive forms and managed feature flags for safe deployments.

items.title: Healthcare Laboratory System for Xybion
items.description: Complete modernization of healthcare legacy application, transforming it into a modern web platform with laboratory research protocols. Led XML to JSON migration, implemented TDD with Angular 16, and developed microservices with NestJS. Modified Angular Material core for custom components in multicultural team.

items.title: Frontend Architecture for McClatchy USA
items.description: As Angular Architect and Frontend Lead, supervised application deployments using Jenkins and led developer teams. Collaborated using Scrum methodologies with Vue.js and JavaScript to create views for all company website publications. Implemented robust testing with Jest.js ensuring quality and user satisfaction.

items.title: Fintech International Payments Platform
items.description: Development of critical modules for fintech international payments platform using Angular with Server-Side Rendering to optimize performance and SEO. Implemented microservices architecture for scalability.

items.title: Enterprise Logistics System for DAT USA
items.description: As Lead Frontend, modernized legacy apps into performant SPAs. Established solid frontend architecture and designed reusable component library. Customized Angular Material components per brand guidelines, reducing bugs by 30% and boosting team velocity.

items.title: Digital Banking Portal and Mobile Wallet
items.description: Developed real-time financial applications with Angular and NestJS. Integrated Apache Kafka for event-driven architecture and created a Mobile Wallet app with Flutter. Implemented complex reactive flows with RxJS for banking transactions.

hero_description: I'm a passionate web developer focused on creating modern and responsive user interfaces with React and Next.js.
about_paragraph1: I'm a web developer with experience in building responsive and high-performance web applications. I specialize in JavaScript, React, and Next.js for frontend development.
about_paragraph2: Currently focused on creating intuitive user interfaces and improving web accessibility across different platforms.
contact_description: Interested in working together? Contact me!
